item.description:
Just general conversation about everything related to technology, science and the interwebs:

ie.
opportunity to share information, field questions and discuss a variety of topics related to web development, programming, project management, software, visual design, etc. including CSS and others.

Meeting Location could be among the following:
Packards Library Room, Media Education Foundation Community Room, or Mama Iguana's Party Room or other-

Note regarding questions when you rsvp:
Please RSVP- it is important for reservation and space considerations and I like to create a handout
for everyone that lists everyones brief bio, area of expertise, and favorite or recent projects.
This helps us get to know eachother and ask more in depth questions and serves as a resource to take
home if we later need to hire or recommend someone for a job or project.
please list your preference (I added it as one of the questions when you rsvp)

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: General Meeting: tips and tricks for web developers, web designers & programers
